workflows.name: Initialize Stocktake Page

action_2.code:
// Mock stocktake sessions data
const mockStocktakeSessions = [
  {
    id: 'st-001',
    name: 'Monthly Inventory Count - January',
    location: 'Warehouse A',
    status: 'completed',
    startedAt: '2024-01-15T09:00:00Z',
    completedAt: '2024-01-15T17:30:00Z',
    createdBy: 'John Doe',
    componentCount: 245
  },
  {
    id: 'st-002', 
    name: 'Quarterly Audit - Q1',
    location: 'Warehouse B',
    status: 'in_progress',
    startedAt: '2024-01-20T08:00:00Z',
    completedAt: null,
    createdBy: 'Jane Smith',
    componentCount: 189
  },
  {
    id: 'st-003',
    name: 'Emergency Count - Missing Items',
    location: 'Warehouse A',
    status: 'cancelled',
    startedAt: '2024-01-18T14:00:00Z',
    completedAt: null,
    createdBy: 'Bob Johnson',
    componentCount: 45
  }
];

return mockStocktakeSessions;
